sentence.cn: 教育是一个逐渐发现自己无知的过程。
sentence.en: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.

sentence.cn: 教育的全部目的是将镜子变为窗户。
sentence.en: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.

sentence.cn: 我坚信要用心来学习。
sentence.en: I'm a firm believer in learning by heart.

sentence.cn: 忘却便是宽恕。
sentence.en: Forgotten is forgiven.

sentence.cn: 活着就是思考。
sentence.en: To live is to think.

data.sentenceSource: - 马尔库斯·图利乌斯·西塞罗

sentence.cn: 我想过自己的生活，而不是记录它。
sentence.en: I want to live my life, not record it.

sentence.cn: 家庭是文明的核心。
sentence.en: The family is the nucleus of civilization.

sentence.cn: 每个人都是无知的，只是在不同的领域罢了。
sentence.en: Everybody is ignorant, only on different subjects.

sentence.cn: 经验就是犯错并从中吸取教训。
sentence.en: Experience is making mistakes and learning from them.

sentence.cn: 你最需要学习的东西你会教得最好。兴趣是最好的老师。
sentence.en: You teach best what you most need to learn.

sentence.cn: 原谅敌人比原谅朋友更容易。
sentence.en: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.

sentence.cn: 没有瑕疵的美不是真正的美。
sentence.en: There is no real beauty without some slight imperfection.

sentence.cn: 研究就是创造新知识。
sentence.en: Research is creating new knowledge.

sentence.cn: 学习永远不会耗尽脑力。
sentence.en: Learning never exhausts the mind.

sentence.cn: 知识唯一的来源是经验。
sentence.en: The only source of knowledge is experience.

sentence.cn: 美本身不过是无限的直观形象。
sentence.en: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the infinite.

sentence.cn: 一颗爱心是最真实的智慧。
sentence.en: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.

sentence.cn: 美丽是一份脆弱的礼物。
sentence.en: Beauty is a fragile gift.

sentence.cn: 幸福是良好的健康加上糟糕的记性。
sentence.en: Happiness is good health and a bad memory.

sentence.cn: 生命中只有一种幸福，那就是爱与被爱。
sentence.en: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.

sentence.cn: 人生苦短，不必长久记仇。
sentence.en: Life is too short for long-term grudges.

sentence.cn: 这里没有陌生人，只有素未谋面的朋友。
sentence.en: There are no strangers here; only friends you haven't yet met.

sentence.cn: 每天都有新的选择。
sentence.en: Every day brings new choices.

sentence.cn: 一个强大、积极的自我形象是成功最好的准备。
sentence.en: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.

sentence.cn: 快乐是一件内心的工作。
sentence.en: Happiness is an inside job.

sentence.cn: 哪里有爱，哪里就有生活。
sentence.en: Where there is love there is life.

sentence.cn: 热情是一切美丽的秘密。
sentence.en: Zest is the secret of all beauty.

sentence.cn: 如果一个人有勇气承认错误，那么错误总是可以被原谅的。
sentence.en: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.

sentence.cn: 失败是抵达卓越的另一个踏脚石。
sentence.en: Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.

sentence.cn: 一个人要仰望多少次才能看见蓝天？
sentence.en: How many times must a man look up before he really sees the sky?

sentence.cn: 巧合和命运在我们的生活中占很大的比重。
sentence.en: Coincidence and fate figure largely in our lives.

sentence.cn: 愿你在生活中保持平衡和隐秘。
sentence.en: In life may you proceed with balance and stealth.

sentence.cn: 无所事事就是通往一事无成的途径。
sentence.en: To do nothing is the way to be nothing.

sentence.cn: 作为女性，我们能完成的事情是无限的。
sentence.en: There is no limit to what we, as women, can accomplish.

sentence.cn: 相信自己可以，你则成功了一半。
sentence.en: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

sentence.cn: 快乐取决于心灵。
sentence.en: Happiness dwells in the soul.

sentence.cn: 勇敢面对人生，突破自己，别轻言放弃。
sentence.en: Live boldly. Push yourself. Don't settle.

sentence.cn: 有何胜利可言？挺住意味着一切。
sentence.en: Who talks of victory? To endure is all.

sentence.cn: 我不愿做任何人，除了我自己。
sentence.en: There is no one I would rather be than me.

sentence.cn: 志向与热爱是飞向伟业的双翼。
sentence.en: Ambition and love are the wings of great actions.

sentence.cn: 如果你不去面对你的恐惧，你就会一直害怕。
sentence.en: If you don't confront your fears, you are always going to be afraid.

sentence.cn: 越努力，越成功。
sentence.en: Much effort, much prosperity.

sentence.cn: 幸运眷顾勇敢者。
sentence.en: Fortune befriends the bold.

sentence.cn: 培养一个老朋友需要很长时间。
sentence.en: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.

sentence.cn: 有些人求助于牧师，有些人求助于诗歌，而我则求助于我的朋友们。
sentence.en: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.

sentence.cn: 当我们热爱这世界时，我们才真正生活在这世上。
sentence.en: We live in the world when we love it.

sentence.cn: 文体要简洁，思想要严谨，生活要果断。
sentence.en: Concision in style, precision in thought, decision in life.

sentence.cn: 把生命中的每一件事都当成最后一件来做。
sentence.en: Do every act of your life as if it were your last.

sentence.cn: 成功是日复一日的努力的总和。
sentence.en: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.

sentence.cn: 衡量生命的标准不是它的期限，而是它的馈赠。
sentence.en: The measure of life is not its duration, but its donation.

sentence.cn: 生活就是当你忙于制定其他计划时发生的事情。
sentence.en: Life is what happens to you while you are busy making other plans.

sentence.cn: 行动是一切成功的关键。
sentence.en: Action is the foundational key to all success.

sentence.cn: 我们往往记住的不是某一天，而是某个时刻。
sentence.en: We do not remember days, we remember moments.

sentence.cn: 朋友是让你能完全做自己的人。
sentence.en: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

sentence.cn: 善妒的人对别人是个麻烦，而对自己则是个折磨。
sentence.en: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.

sentence.cn: 运动是不会疲倦的劳动。
sentence.en: Exercise is labor without weariness.

sentence.cn: 笑是两个人之间最近的距离。
sentence.en: Laughter is the closest distance between two people.

sentence.cn: 所有你乐于挥霍的时间都不算做浪费。
sentence.en: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.

sentence.cn: 勇气高于一切是战士的第一品质。
sentence.en: Courage, above all things, is the first quality of a warrior.

sentence.cn: 一旦你给我贴上标签，你就否定了我。
sentence.en: Once you label me, you negate me.

sentence.cn: 自律是目标和成就之间的桥梁。
sentence.en: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

sentence.cn: 读书之于思想，犹如运动之于身体。
sentence.en: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.

sentence.cn: 嫉妒是感情的坟墓。
sentence.en: Jealousy is the grave of affection.

sentence.cn: 笑是即刻的假期。
sentence.en: Laughter is an instant vacation.

sentence.cn: 诚实是智慧之书的第一章。
sentence.en: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.

sentence.cn: 我不要爱情、金钱和名誉，给我真理。
sentence.en: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me the truth.

sentence.cn: 过去是无法疗愈的。
sentence.en: The past cannot be cured.

sentence.cn: 不管你定不定闹钟，早晨都会到来。
sentence.en: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not.

sentence.cn: 岁月不等人。
sentence.en: Time and tide wait for no man.

sentence.cn: 梦想是今天对明天问题的答案。
sentence.en: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.

sentence.cn: 明智地解决问题，耐心地执行。
sentence.en: Wise to resolve, and patient to perform.

sentence.cn: 忍耐是痛苦的，但它的果实是甜蜜的。
sentence.en: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.

sentence.cn: 自然保护是人与土地和谐相处的一种状态。
sentence.en: Conservation is a state of harmony between men and land.

sentence.cn: 努力让地球成为一个比你出生时更美好的地方。
sentence.en: Try to leave the Earth a better place than when you arrived.

sentence.cn: 先得有梦想才能有成就。
sentence.en: Nothing happens unless first we dream.

sentence.cn: 如果自身不谦卑，就无法尊重他人。
sentence.en: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.

data.sentenceSource: - 安里·佛烈迪克·阿米埃尔

sentence.cn: 幸福不是一个地点，而是一个方向。
sentence.en: Happiness is a direction, not a place.

sentence.cn: 没有宽恕就没有爱，没有爱就没有宽恕。
sentence.en: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.

sentence.cn: 幸福不在于我们拥有多少，而在于我们从中享受多少。
sentence.en: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.

sentence.cn: 把握好自己的命运吧，否则别人会掌握它。
sentence.en: Control your own destiny or someone else will.

sentence.cn: 每个国家的基础都是青年人的教育。
sentence.en: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.

sentence.cn: 星星掌握不了我们的命运，命运掌握在我们自己手上。
sentence.en: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.

sentence.cn: 教育的目的是令能接受新思想的头脑去取代一个空虚的灵魂。
sentence.en: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.

sentence.cn: 英雄主义就是再多忍耐一刻。
sentence.en: Heroism is endurance for one moment more.

sentence.cn: 你要先确定自己的立场是正确的，在此之后就决不动摇。
sentence.en: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.

sentence.cn: 爱情是两个身体里居住着同一个灵魂。
sentence.en: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

sentence.cn: 新行动产生新力量。
sentence.en: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.

sentence.cn: 极致美是画家无法呈现的。
sentence.en: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.

sentence.cn: 让每一个人都作为个人而受到尊重，而不让任何人成为被崇拜的偶像。
sentence.en: Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized.

sentence.cn: 勇气是压力之下的优雅。
sentence.en: Courage is grace under pressure.

sentence.cn: 只有那些甘愿冒险不断前进的人，才会清楚了解自己的潜力何在。
sentence.en: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

sentence.cn: 交友满天下，知心无一人。
sentence.en: A friend to all is a friend to none.

sentence.cn: 美就是力量，微笑乃是它的利剑。
sentence.en: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.

sentence.cn: 爱是唯一一种化敌为友的方式。
sentence.en: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.

sentence.cn: 今日的科学就是明日的技术。
sentence.en: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.

sentence.cn: 犯错者是人，谅错者是神。
sentence.en: To err is human; to forgive divine.

sentence.cn: 紫罗兰把它的香气留在那踩扁了它的脚踝上，这就是宽恕。
sentence.en: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.

sentence.cn: 态度虽小，影响却大。
sentence.en: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.

sentence.cn: 名声是不断移动的盘子里易坏的食物。
sentence.en: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate.

sentence.cn: 不要从可以接受的事情开始，而要从正确的事情开始做。
sentence.en: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable.

sentence.cn: 年终既不是结束，也不是开始，而是去年的延续。
sentence.en: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on.

sentence.cn: 成功不是偶然，成功其实是一种选择。
sentence.en: Success is not an accident. Success is actually a choice.

sentence.cn: 你的每一项专长都能为幸福铺路。
sentence.en: Anything you're good at contributes to happiness.

sentence.cn: 世事变幻不休歇，不变的是情深切切。
sentence.en: The world uncertain comes and goes, the lover rooted stays.

sentence.cn: 没有任何陷阱比你为自己所设的陷阱更致命。
sentence.en: There is no trap so deadly as the trap you set for yourself.

sentence.cn: 比起令人鄙视的东西，人身上有更多值得钦佩的地方。
sentence.en: There are more things to admire in men than to despise.

sentence.cn: 我将在心中尊重圣诞节，并试着保持这样一整年。
sentence.en: I will honor Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.

sentence.cn: 我一步步向上，追寻那闪烁的光芒。
sentence.en: I'm reaching for the height, and chasing all the lights that shine.

sentence.cn: 成功来自于信念、永恒的激情和不懈的努力。
sentence.en: Success is born out of faith, an undying passion, and a relentless drive.

sentence.cn: 没有准备的人，就是在准备失败。
sentence.en: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.

sentence.cn: 我隐秘的生命之泉，因友谊的存在而甘美。
sentence.en: The fountains of my hidden life are through thy friendship fair.

sentence.cn: 只要你知道怎么做，任何事情都是有趣的。
sentence.en: Everything is interesting if you know how to work on it.

sentence.cn: 那些我最珍视的记忆从未褪色。
sentence.en: The memories I value most, I don't ever see them fading.

sentence.cn: 悲伤使人格外敏锐。
sentence.en: Grief sharpens the mind.

sentence.cn: 只有当你被追逐时，你才变得敏捷。
sentence.en: It is only when you are pursued that you become swift.

sentence.cn: 传统是向导，而不是狱卒。
sentence.en: Tradition is a guide and not a jailer.

sentence.cn: 我们都生活在阴沟里，但仍有人仰望星空。
sentence.en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

sentence.cn: 耐心等待。风车从不跑去找风。
sentence.en: Patience. The windmill never strays in search of the wind.

sentence.cn: 希望是一个好东西，也许是最好的，而好东西不会消亡。
sentence.en: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things. No good thing ever dies.

sentence.cn: 错误时常发生，但你不能再让它们发生两次。
sentence.en: Mistakes happen, but you've got to stop making them happen twice.

sentence.cn: 我可以接受失败，但我不能接受不去尝试。
sentence.en: I can accept failure, but I can't accept not trying.

sentence.cn: 生活总会有点不顺意，我们都会犯错。
sentence.en: Life's a little bit messy. We all make mistakes.

sentence.cn: 嫁给一个王子不是唯一一个可以让你变成公主的方法。
sentence.en: Marrying a prince is not a prerequisite for being a princess.

sentence.cn: 我爬的越高，就越被眼前的景色所震撼。
sentence.en: The higher I got, the more amazed I was by the view.

sentence.cn: 如果你仔细找找，你会发现爱其实无处不在。
sentence.en: I've got a sneaky feeling you'll find that love is all around.

sentence.cn: 今天，我活在此时此刻，如此日复一日，我称它为“成就”。
sentence.en: Today I live each day, day by day, and I call it "FULFILLMENT".

sentence.cn: 对明智的人来说，每一天的时间都要精打细算。
sentence.en: To sensible men, every day is a day of reckoning.

sentence.cn: 你不主宰时光，时光就会主宰你。
sentence.en: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

sentence.cn: 即使是最疲惫的河流，也终会入海安身。
sentence.en: Even the weariest river winds somewhere safe to sea.

sentence.cn: 人生并非只是吃喝玩乐。
sentence.en: Life isn't all beer and skittles.

sentence.cn: 与其说教育是为了谋生，不如说是为了造就一个人。
sentence.en: An education is not so much about making a living as making a person.

sentence.cn: 弱者报复，强者原谅，智者无视。
sentence.en: Weak people revenge. Strong people forgive. Intelligent people ignore.

sentence.cn: 如果你在等待时机成熟，那刚才就是。
sentence.en: If you were waiting for the opportune moment, that was it.

sentence.cn: 信念，就是即使看不到长阶通向何方，却仍愿意迈出第一步。
sentence.en: Faith is taking the first step when you don't see the whole staircase.

sentence.cn: 重点不在于推开不好的东西，而是给它腾出空间。
sentence.en: The point isn't to push the bad stuff away, it's to make room for it.

sentence.cn: 在命运为你安排的属于自己的时区里，一切都准时。
sentence.en: You are very much on time, and in your time zone destiny is set up for you.

sentence.cn: 所有的成功都需要有所付出。
sentence.en: All victories inevitably come at a cost.

sentence.cn: 这一瞬间，你意识到自己并不是悲剧的主角。你充满着生命力。
sentence.en: This one moment you know that you're not a sad story. You are alive.

sentence.cn: 每一笔知识上面的投资，总会得到最好的收益。
sentence.en: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

sentence.cn: 提高就是要改变，而要达到完美就要不断改变。
sentence.en: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.

sentence.cn: 善念、善言、善事，这是你应有的志向。
sentence.en: Good thoughts, good words, good deeds, that's what you should aspire to.

sentence.cn: 人们需要希望，来相信有人在不远处守护着他们。
sentence.en: People need hope to know someone's out there for them.

sentence.cn: 在这里，现实无界，想象无边。
sentence.en: It's a place where the limits of reality are your own imagination.

sentence.cn: 有的人值得你去融化。
sentence.en: Some people are worth melting for.

sentence.cn: 决定我们是否富有的，不是我们拥有的东西，而是我们没有也行的东西。
sentence.en: We are not rich by what we possess but by what we can do without.

sentence.cn: 如果我不曾见过太阳，我本可以忍受黑暗。
sentence.en: Had I not seen the Sun I could have borne the shade.

data.sentenceSource: - 艾米莉·狄金森《如果我不曾见过太阳》

sentence.cn: 问题不是谁会允许我，而是谁能阻止我。
sentence.en: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

sentence.cn: 因为你以为你看到的越多，你就越容易被欺骗。
sentence.en: Because the more you think you see, the easier it'll be to fool you.

sentence.cn: 失去的东西到最后总会有办法回来的。
sentence.en: The things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end.

sentence.cn: 我没有失败。我只是发现了一万种不成功的方法。
sentence.en: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

sentence.cn: 沉默是滋养智慧的睡眠。
sentence.en: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.

sentence.cn: 真正的才智是刚毅的志向。
sentence.en: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.

sentence.cn: 前行，是人生唯一重要的方向。
sentence.en: The only direction in life that matters is forward.

sentence.cn: 不要有任何回头看错误的想法。
sentence.en: Don’t have the inclination to look back on any mistake.

sentence.cn: 一个微笑能治愈皱眉带来的伤害。
sentence.en: A smile cures the wounding of a frown.

sentence.cn: 美藏在看客的眼睛里。
sentence.en: Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder.

sentence.cn: 如果你有足够的勇气，一切皆有可能。
sentence.en: Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.

sentence.cn: 永远不要和猪摔跤。你会弄脏自己，而猪还很喜欢。
sentence.en: Never wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it.

sentence.cn: 最黑暗的夜晚也会迎来清晨。
sentence.en: The gloomiest night will wear on to a morning.

sentence.cn: 当你将世界抛在脑后，告别忧虑，你就能飞起来。
sentence.en: When you leave the world behind and bid your cares goodbye, you can fly.

sentence.cn: 那些让你消沉的事情会让你振作起来。
sentence.en: The very things that hold you down are going to lift you up.

sentence.cn: 言语浅薄如时间，沉默深沉如永恒。
sentence.en: Speech is of time, silence is of eternity.

sentence.cn: 无法改变想法的人，无法改变任何事。
sentence.en: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.

sentence.cn: 短暂地麻痹痛苦，当你最终感受到它时，痛苦只会变得更强烈。
sentence.en: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.

sentence.cn: 用爱的眼睛才能看到真正的美。
sentence.en: True beauty is what you see with the eyes of love.

sentence.cn: 世间最可鄙的事情莫过于恐惧。
sentence.en: The basest of all things is to be afraid.

sentence.cn: 生命最大的乐趣之一就在于其神奇的不可预测性。
sentence.en: One of the great joys of life is its wondrous unpredictability.

sentence.cn: 唯有语言文字，始终记录着世间的一切。
sentence.en: Language will continue to put the world into words.

sentence.cn: 一切伟大而珍贵的东西都是孤独的。
sentence.en: All great and precious things are lonely.

sentence.cn: 时间乃是最大的革新家。
sentence.en: Time is the biggest innovation.

sentence.cn: 当心！因为我无所畏惧，所以我无比强大。
sentence.en: Beware! For I am fearless, and therefore powerful.

sentence.cn: 不要把一次失败和最终失败混为一谈。
sentence.en: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.

sentence.cn: 你每生气一分钟，也就失去了六十秒的幸福。
sentence.en: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.

sentence.cn: 人生短暂，我绝不听命于平庸。
sentence.en: My life is short. I can't listen to banality.

sentence.cn: 一片树林里分出两条路，而我选择了人迹更少的那条。
sentence.en: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by.

sentence.cn: 我们为什么跌倒？因为这样我们才能学会怎样站起来。
sentence.en: Why do we fall? So we can learn to pick ourselves up.

sentence.cn: 我语言的边界，即我世界的边界。
sentence.en: The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.

sentence.cn: 实现不可能的唯一办法就是要相信凡事皆有可能。
sentence.en: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

sentence.cn: 人最爱别人倾注热情的事物。
sentence.en: People love what other people are passionate about!

sentence.cn: 若我铠甲被打碎，我要将碎片熔铸缝合。
sentence.en: If my armor breaks, I’ll fuse it back together.

sentence.cn: 坦诚的分歧往往是进步的好迹象。
sentence.en: Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress.

sentence.cn: 不要停下，那些过往会将你牵绊。你知道，当下的光阴才最重要。
sentence.en: Don't stop, the past'll trip you up. You know right now's gotta be enough.

sentence.cn: 欢迎来到现实世界，它糟透了，但你会爱上它的。
sentence.en: Welcome to the real world. It sucks. You’re gonna love it.

sentence.cn: 我跨越时间的海洋寻找你。
sentence.en: I have crossed oceans of time to find you.

sentence.cn: 不要老是回忆过去，它只能揪住你的心，什么事也干不成。
sentence.en: Don’t look back, it drags your heart until you can't do anything but look back.

sentence.cn: 不积小流，无以成江海。
sentence.en: What is an ocean but a multitude of drops.

sentence.cn: 你怎么衡量生命中的一年？爱怎么样？用爱衡量。
sentence.en: How do you measure a year in the life? How about love? Measure in love.

sentence.cn: 你所爱之人会改变你，你所学之物将会指引你。
sentence.en: The people you love will change you, the things you have learned will guide you.

sentence.cn: 父母和孩子是彼此人生中最珍贵的礼物。
sentence.en: Parents and children are life’s greatest gifts to each other.

sentence.cn: 人们给自己犯过的错取名叫经验。
sentence.en: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.

sentence.cn: 别让他人嘈杂的意见淹没了你内心的声音。
sentence.en: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.

sentence.cn: 美好的事物永远会在这里等着你。
sentence.en: The good things will always be here waiting for you.

sentence.cn: 问题不是止步不前的标志，而是前进的指引。
sentence.en: Problems are not stop signs; they are guidelines.

sentence.cn: 如果不勇于尝试，你永远不知道自己有多强大。
sentence.en: You never know what you’re capable of until you try.

sentence.cn: 其他人可能会循规蹈矩，但我必须遵循自己的内心。
sentence.en: The rest of the world may follow the rules, but I must follow my heart.

sentence.cn: 爱能超越一切差异。
sentence.en: Love transcends all differences.

sentence.cn: 我们是那迷失璀璨梦境的繁星，不顾一切只为照亮黑夜。
sentence.en: We are all lost stars, trying to light up the dark.

sentence.cn: 希望是长着翅膀的鸟儿，栖居在人们的灵魂之中。
sentence.en: Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.

sentence.cn: 粗鲁是弱者对力量的模仿。
sentence.en: Rudeness is the weak man's imitation of strength.

sentence.cn: 事情愈艰难，最后愈能得到丰厚的果实。
sentence.en: The more difficult something is, the more rewarding it is in the end.

sentence.cn: 人品之于人，犹如芳香之于花。
sentence.en: Personality is to man what perfume is to a flower.

sentence.cn: 青春不是年华，而是心境。
sentence.en: Youth is not a time of life, it is a state of mind.

sentence.cn: 不要用你的收成来评价你的每一天，而要看你每天播种了多少。
sentence.en: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.

sentence.cn: 人类所有的智慧可以归结为两个词：等待和希望。
sentence.en: All human wisdom is summed up in two words: wait and hope.

sentence.cn: 勇气是一切美德攀登的阶梯。
sentence.en: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.

sentence.cn: 定义属于下定义者，而不是被定义的人。
sentence.en: Definitions belong to the definers, not the defined.

sentence.cn: 欲望不要落俗，也不得平庸。
sentence.en: Be not cheap or mediocre in desiring.

sentence.cn: 面具下的我是谁并不重要，定义我的是我的所作所为。
sentence.en: It's not who I am underneath but what I do that defines me.

sentence.cn: 怀璧慎显，博识谨言。
sentence.en: Have more than you show, speak less than you know.

sentence.cn: 不必行色匆匆，不必闪耀夺目，不必成为别人，只需做好自己。
sentence.en: No need to hurry. No need to sparkle. No need to be anybody but oneself.

sentence.cn: 月亮是孤独者的倾诉对象。
sentence.en: The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to.

sentence.cn: 比一千天勤奋学习更好的是和一个伟大的老师在一起一天。
sentence.en: Better than a thousand days of diligent study is one day with a great teacher.

sentence.cn: 每颗心都在唱着一首残缺的歌，直到另一颗心轻声和应。
sentence.en: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back.

sentence.cn: 只要是值得做的事，永远都不怕晚。
sentence.en: For what it's worth, it's never too late.

sentence.cn: 生活是世上最稀少的事，大多数人只是活着，仅此而已。
sentence.en: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

sentence.cn: 只要有一个爱我们的人，我们就能够生存下来了。
sentence.en: All we need to survive is one person who truly loves us.

sentence.cn: 你比任何人认为的都要强大。
sentence.en: You are much stronger than anyone gives you credit for.

sentence.cn: 自我怀疑是创造力的头号公敌。
sentence.en: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.

sentence.cn: 如果你把所有的错误都关在门外时，真理也要被关在门外面了。
sentence.en: If you shut your door to all errors, truth will be shut out.

sentence.cn: 目的不在于永远活着，要诀是永远活出自己。
sentence.en: It's not just about living forever, the trick is living with yourself forever.

sentence.cn: 有时爱情是朵含蓄的花，需要时间才能怒放。
sentence.en: Sometimes affection is a shy flower that takes time to blossom.

sentence.cn: 一天是永恒的缩影。
sentence.en: A day is a miniature of eternity.

sentence.cn: 美好人生是启之以爱、导之以知的人生。
sentence.en: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.

sentence.cn: 岁月悠悠，衰微只及肌肤；热忱抛却，颓废必至灵魂。
sentence.en: Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.

sentence.cn: 当你发现自己的机遇，一定抓紧它。
sentence.en: When you see your moment, you must seize it.

sentence.cn: 你到底是谁，生活总会给你答案。
sentence.en: Life has a way of reminding you of who you are.

sentence.cn: 一个人从不犯错，只是因为他不曾尝试过任何新鲜事物。
sentence.en: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

sentence.cn: 飞向宇宙，浩瀚无垠。
sentence.en: To infinity and beyond.

sentence.cn: 有时起初的隐忍可以避免一路的疼痛。
sentence.en: Sometimes a little discomfort in the beginning can save much pain down the road.

sentence.cn: 爱你生活的日子，过你所爱的生活。
sentence.en: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.

sentence.cn: 对未来真正的慷慨，是把一切都献给现在。
sentence.en: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.

sentence.cn: 要当心忙碌的生活带来内心的荒芜。
sentence.en: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.

sentence.cn: 害怕也不要紧，我们只需要勇往直前。
sentence.en: It's okay to be scared, we just have to do it anyway.

sentence.cn: 我希望你能有勇气重新启程。
sentence.en: I hope you have the strength to start all over again.

sentence.cn: 只要你一息尚存，就不能退缩。
sentence.en: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.

sentence.cn: 乐观主义者就是想象未来的不确定性的人。
sentence.en: An optimist is one who imagines that the future is uncertain.

sentence.cn: 我从不回看过去，亲爱的。因为那样会使人对现在分心。
sentence.en: I never look back, darling. It distracts me from the now.

sentence.cn: 不要努力去做一个成功的人，而应该努力去做一个有价值的人。
sentence.en: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

sentence.cn: 奇迹每天都在发生。
sentence.en: Miracles happen every day.

sentence.cn: 世上有什么东西能够阻挡人的坚定的信念和意志呢？
sentence.en: What can stop the determined heart and resolved will of man?

sentence.cn: 毕竟，明天又是新的一天！
sentence.en: After all, tomorrow is another day!

sentence.cn: 人类有一种本能：帮助彼此走出困境。
sentence.en: Every human being has a basic instinct: to help each other out.

sentence.cn: 你看不见你自己，你所看见的只是你的影子。
sentence.en: What you are you do not see, what you see is your shadow.

sentence.cn: 今天是上帝的馈赠，所以“现在”就是最好的礼物。
sentence.en: Today is a gift, that is why it is called the present.

sentence.cn: 时间的利齿可以吞噬一切别的东西，对真理却无能为力。
sentence.en: Time, whose tooth gnaws away everything else, is powerless against truth.

sentence.cn: 人类有一件真正有力的武器，那就是笑。
sentence.en: The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.

sentence.cn: 生命从不曾离开过孤独而独立存在。
sentence.en: Life has never been independent without loneliness.

sentence.cn: 世上这么多孤独的人，都是因为害怕迈出第一步。
sentence.en: The world is full of lonely people afraid to make the first move.

sentence.cn: 我是否该将你比作夏日？
sentence.en: Shall I compare thee to a summer's day?

sentence.cn: 幸福是每一个小小的愿望都能实现。
sentence.en: Happiness is about having each tiny wish come true.

sentence.cn: 爱会为我们找到一条路，让狼群都不敢来侵扰。
sentence.en: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.

sentence.cn: 只有用心才能看清真相，真正重要的东西用眼睛是看不到的。
sentence.en: One sees clearly only with the heart; what is essential is invisible to the eye.

sentence.cn: 逆境中绽放的花朵才是最珍贵、最美丽的。
sentence.en: The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful one.

sentence.cn: 善良的心能使附近的一切都生机盎然，充满欢笑。
sentence.en: A kind heart makes everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.

sentence.cn: 伟大工作的完成，不是凭着力量，而是凭着恒心。
sentence.en: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.

sentence.cn: 唯一一件不会遵从少数服从多数原则的事是人的良心。
sentence.en: The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience.

sentence.cn: 你只是想的太多了，你应该多跟着感觉走。
sentence.en: You just live up here too much. You need to be more in touch with your feelings.

sentence.cn: 强者救赎自己，圣人普度他人。
sentence.en: It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another.

sentence.cn: 开心治不好的病，医药也无能为力。
sentence.en: No medicine cures what happiness cannot.

sentence.cn: 人生的重大悲剧不是死亡，而是他们不再去爱。
sentence.en: The great tragedy of life is not that men perish, but that they cease to love.

sentence.cn: 各色人等，每一个人都有属于自己的位置。
sentence.en: All sorts of persons, and every individual, have a place to fill in the world.

sentence.cn: 对一切漠不关心太容易了，但有所在乎却要无尽的勇气。
sentence.en: It's so easy to be callous, it takes courage and courage to care.

sentence.cn: 当人的外表和他的灵魂如此不相称，那是很苦恼的事情。
sentence.en: When a man's appearance is so incompatible with his soul, it is very distressing.

sentence.cn: 人生最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。
sentence.en: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.

sentence.cn: 人可以爬到最高峰，但他不能在那儿停留太久。
sentence.en: Man can climb to the highest summit, but he cannot dwell there long.

sentence.cn: 世界上能为别人减轻负担的都不是庸庸碌碌之徒。
sentence.en: No one is useless in the world who lightens the burden of it for anyone else.

sentence.cn: 战争无法消灭高尚的情操。
sentence.en: War doesn't negate decency.

sentence.cn: 聚散终有时，潇洒走一回。
sentence.en: Sometimes accompanied, sometimes alone, stay awesome all the time.

sentence.cn: 我做过的事，并不是每件都让我问心无愧，但要是再来一次，我肯定还是会那么做的。
sentence.en: I'm not proud of everything I did, but I'm pretty sure I'd do it all again.

sentence.cn: 光有志向是不够的，重要的是你的能力。
sentence.en: It's not about how badly you want something. It's about what you are capable of!

sentence.cn: 笑是一种没有副作用的镇定剂。
sentence.en: Laughter is a tranquilizer with no side effects.

sentence.cn: 爱是我们唯一能够感知的可以超越时空维度的事物。
sentence.en: Love is the one thing we're capable of perceiving that transcends time and space.

sentence.cn: 你永远不会以暴力取胜。只有保持尊严才能战胜一切。
sentence.en: You never win with violence. You only win when you maintain your dignity.

sentence.cn: 没有什么不幸可以和时间的损失相比了。
sentence.en: No other misfortune can be compared with the loss of time.

sentence.cn: 人生而平等，我必须，我也可以平等地追求爱。
sentence.en: Life is equal, I must, I can also be equal to the pursuit of love.

sentence.cn: 错误经不起失败，但是真理却不怕失败。
sentence.en: Wrong cannot afford defeat but right can.

sentence.cn: 人不能活在梦里而忘记生活。
sentence.en: It does not do well to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

sentence.cn: 坏事并不总是会破坏好事，或者使它们变得不重要。
sentence.en: The bad things don't always spoil the good things or make them unimportant.

sentence.cn: 我觉得生命是一份礼物，我不想浪费它。
sentence.en: I figure life is a gift and I don't intend on wasting it.

sentence.cn: 如果我看得比别人更远些，那是因为我站在巨人的肩膀上。
sentence.en: If I have seen farther than others, it is because I was standing on the shoulders of giants.

sentence.cn: Procrastination is the thief of time.
sentence.en: 拖延乃光阴之窃贼。

sentence.cn: 怕输的人已经输了。
sentence.en: The man who fears losing has already lost.

sentence.cn: 傲慢让别人无法来爱我，偏见让我无法去爱别人。
sentence.en: Arrogance makes others unable to love me, and prejudice makes me unable to love others.

sentence.cn: 我走得很慢，但是我从不后退。
sentence.en: I am a slow walker but I never walk backwards.

sentence.cn: 张开翅膀尽情飞翔，我相信我能高飞。
sentence.en: Spread my wings and fly away, I believe I can soar.

sentence.cn: 你要把过去抛之脑后，才能继续向前。
sentence.en: You have got to put the past behind you before you can move on.

sentence.cn: 我要扼住命运的咽喉，绝不让命运所压倒。
sentence.en: I will take fate by the throat, it will not bend me completely to its will.

sentence.cn: 成功由大量的失误铸就。
sentence.en: Success covers a multitude of blunders.

sentence.cn: 没什么比信仰更能支撑我们度过艰难时光了。
sentence.en: Nothing can help us endure dark times better than our faith.

sentence.cn: 进步是今天的活动，明天的保证。
sentence.en: Progress is the activity of today and the assurance of tomorrow.

sentence.cn: 一个人可以被毁灭，但不能被打败。
sentence.en: A man can be destroyed but not defeated.

sentence.cn: 开始一件事的方法，就是停止说并起身去做。
sentence.en: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

sentence.cn: 时间不等人，你拥有的每一刻都要珍惜。
sentence.en: Time waits for no one. Treasure every moment you have.

sentence.cn: 现在，我不需要一个英雄的拯救，因为我自己可以拯救我自己。
sentence.en: Now I don't need a hero to survive, cause I already saved my life.

sentence.cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。
sentence.en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.

sentence.cn: 我的人生由我掌舵，我将主导我的命运之海。
sentence.en: I'm the one at the sail. I'm the master of my sea.

sentence.cn: 不要温和地走进那个良夜。
sentence.en: Do not go gentle into that good night.

sentence.cn: 一贯的乐观能使力量倍增。
sentence.en: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.

sentence.cn: 全心投入，直到倾尽所有。
sentence.en: Play like the top one percent, till nothing's left to be spent.

sentence.cn: 让你的脸对着阳光，你就看不到阴影。
sentence.en: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

sentence.cn: 仅仅站着凝视水面是无法渡海的。
sentence.en: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

sentence.cn: 英语里没有哪两个词比"不错”更毁人了
sentence.en: There are no two words in the English language more harmful than good job.

sentence.cn: 脚踏实地，遥望星空。
sentence.en: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

sentence.cn: 世上没有高不可攀的峰。
sentence.en: Every mountain is unclimbable until someone climbs it.

sentence.cn: 未经审视的人生是不值得过的。
sentence.en: The unexamined life is not worth living.

sentence.cn: 去奋斗，去追求，去发现，永不屈服。
sentence.en: To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.

sentence.cn: 天赋只意味着终身不懈的努力。
sentence.en: Genius only means hard-working all one's life.

sentence.cn: 能量加毅力可以征服一切。
sentence.en: Energy and persistence conquer all things.

sentence.cn: 你只需把握住机会，生活便会焕发光彩。
sentence.en: You just gotta ignite the light, and let it shine.

sentence.cn: 生活没有目标就像航海没有指南针。
sentence.en: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.

sentence.cn: 只要梦想还未被悔恨淹没，我们就还年轻。
sentence.en: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

sentence.cn: 美好的事物从不会来自舒适圈。
sentence.en: Great things never come from comfort zones.

sentence.cn: 如果你因失去了太阳而流泪，那么你也将失去群星了。
sentence.en: If you shed tears when you miss the sun, you also miss the stars.

sentence.cn: 千里之行，始于足下。
sentence.en: It takes one step to start a journey. It's up to you to make it real.

sentence.cn: 只有惊艳自己，才能惊艳他人。
sentence.en: Surprise yourself so you can surprise the audience.

sentence.cn: 我们要征服的不是高山，是我们自己。
sentence.en: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.

sentence.cn: 我没有失败。我只是发现了一万种不成功的方法。
sentence.en: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

sentence.cn: 生活的关键不在于积累，而是贡献。
sentence.en: The key to life is not accumulation. It’s contribution.

sentence.cn: 目标帮助你将能量转化为行动。
sentence.en: Goals help you channel your energy into action.

sentence.cn: 好事发生在那些努力的人身上。
sentence.en: Good things happen to those who hustle.

sentence.cn: 胜人者有力，自胜者强。
sentence.en: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.

sentence.cn: 如果你有能力去爱，请先爱自己。
sentence.en: If you have the ability to love, love yourself first.

sentence.cn: 知识会说话，但智慧会倾听。
sentence.en: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.

sentence.cn: 怀疑比失败更能扼杀梦想。
sentence.en: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

sentence.cn: 通往成功的道路总是在建设之中。
sentence.en: The road to success is always under construction.

sentence.cn: 如果机会不敲门，就建一扇门。
sentence.en: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.

sentence.cn: 我们可能会遇到许多失败，但我们决不能被打败。
sentence.en: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

sentence.cn: 如果你愿意，生活很快就会发生变化，而且是以非常积极的方式。
sentence.en: Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.

sentence.cn: 幸福不是偶然的，而是靠选择。
sentence.en: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

sentence.cn: 你今天所做的一切，可以改善你所有的明天。
sentence.en: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

sentence.cn: 所有的限制都是自我施加的。
sentence.en: All limitations are self-imposed.

sentence.cn: 每一个成就都是从决定去尝试开始的。
sentence.en: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.

sentence.cn: 现在拼命执行的好计划胜过下周执行的完美计划。
sentence.en: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

sentence.cn: 名声并非荣耀，德行才是目标。
sentence.en: Fame is not the glory; virtue is the goal.

sentence.cn: 你深信不疑的事情总会发生。
sentence.en: The thing always happens that you really believe in.

sentence.cn: 工作是一种乐趣时，生活是一种享受！工作是一种义务时，生活则是一种苦役。
sentence.en: When work is a pleasure, life is joy! When work is duty, life is slavery.

sentence.cn: 你必须从别人的错误中吸取教训。
sentence.en: You must learn from the mistakes of others.

sentence.cn: 珍惜你的愿望和梦想吧！
sentence.en: Cherish your visions and your dreams.

sentence.cn: 相信自己，为自己考虑，为自己做事，为自己说话。
sentence.en: Trust yourself. Think for yourself. Act for yourself. Speak for yourself.

sentence.cn: 把困难当成生命中不可或缺的一部分。
sentence.en: Expect trouble as an inevitable part of life.

sentence.cn: 永远看你留下了什么。千万别看你失去了什么。
sentence.en: Always look at what you have left. Never look at what you have lost.

sentence.cn: 今天我愿意做别人不愿做的事，因此明天我可以达到别人达不成的事。
sentence.en: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.

sentence.cn: 失败只是一个重新开始的机会，这一次要更加明智。
sentence.en: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

sentence.cn: 一次痛苦的经验抵得上无数不痛不痒的告诫。
sentence.en: One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.

sentence.cn: 生活因各种友谊而坚固。
sentence.en: Life is to be fortified by many friendships.
